articles.title: FM Spokesman on Attempt to Refer Warship Sinking to UN
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on Attempt to Refer Warship Sinking to UN
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA on Friday as regards the U.S. and its followers' attempt to refer the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking to the UN Security Council after linking it with the DPRK:
					 As already clarified by the DPRK, the "results of the investigation" into the case announced by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are a sheer fabrication. If they are true, there will be no reason for them to refuse to receive the inspection group of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK as already proposed by it to have those "results" confirmed objectively.
					
					 What is essential for settling this case is for the DPRK, a victim of the case, to verify the "results".
					
					 To begin with, the "investigation team" cooked up by the south Korean authorities under the manipulation of the U.S. is a vague entity not in line with the international norms at all. 
					
					 The military has the final say and some foreigners are said to be involved in the team but it was absolutely unknown what procedure and process they went through before being chosen as its members and whether all of them signed the paper carrying the "results of the investigation" or not.
					
					 This was the reason why the south Korean authorities were compelled to give to the above-said team deformed name called "civilian-military investigation team" something unprecedented in the world, instead of formally naming it an international investigation team.
					
					 They are now mulling inviting experts of individual countries which are not the victims of the case to visit south Korea in a bid to tone down the international criticism that the "results" are doubtful. 
					
					 The UNSC should not follow the precedent in which its forum was besmirched by the U.S. with its lies about Iraq.
					
					 It is important for the member countries of the UNSC to pay primary attention to objectively probing the truth behind the case and make a right decision of their own if they do not wish to see the council reduced again to a tool for high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. 
					
					 In case the above-said issue is referred to the council, it should take measures, before anything else, to ensure that the U.S. and south Korea receive the inspection group of the NDC as already proposed by the DPRK and have the "results of the investigation" confirmed by it. 
					
					 It will be irrefutably evident that the U.S. and its followers are seeking an ulterior intention if they refer the case to the UNSC only with their unilateral "results of investigation" while avoiding objective confirmation about its truth.
					
					 Then, the U.S. and the UNSC will find nothing to say about the toughest retaliation the DPRK is to take as it did in the past, and they will never shrug off the responsibility for having blocked the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and sparked off a conflict.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Head of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Head of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 Accusing the hostile forces of their mean campaign against the DPRK, the chairman said that he would always stand by the side of the Korean people in the struggle for the cause of justice.
					
					He expressed belief that the Korean people would always emerge victorious under the Songun politics.

articles.title: Head of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation Supports Korean Cause
articles.content:
Head of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation Supports Korean Cause
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, now on a visit to the DPRK was interviewed by reporters here on Friday.
					 President Kim Il Sung is the most distinguished great man recognized by the world, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung devoted all his life to the prosperity of the DPRK and the happiness of the people, the world peace and the human cause of independence.
					
					 That is why the world people miss him very much and deeply revere him.
					
					 Referring to the present international situation, he continued:
					
					 A grave situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the warship "Cheonan" sinking case orchestrated by the south Korean authorities. This was caused by their moves to tarnish the image of the DPRK.
					
					 The assertions of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities about the case are all hypocritical and groundless.
					
					 At this time I visited the DPRK to express my invariable support for the Korean people.
					
					 Peace is ensured on the peninsula thanks to the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 What I felt in the course of meeting many people is that the Korean people are single-mindedly united around their leader.
					
					 The Korean people are now waging a dynamic struggle to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.
					
					 I extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people's just cause.
					
					 I will sincerely help the Korean people in their struggle as chairman of the foundation going by the august name of Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea and peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Art Festival of Schoolchildren Held
articles.content:
Art Festival of Schoolchildren Held
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A performance of the 49th National Art Festival of Schoolchildren took place at the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace Friday.
					 Put on its stage were such colorful numbers as Oungum ensemble "Generalissimo Speaks by Me", chorus in drum unison "June 6 Is Our Holiday" and dance "Ongdal Spring on Pass".
					
					 The performers loudly sang of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung who dedicated his all to the children while treating them with warmest love and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has provided and reliably protected the happiness of posterity with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 They vividly represented the resolution of schoolchildren to prepare themselves to be a dependable successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche with ample knowledge, noble morality and strong body and do a lot of good things helpful to building a rich and powerful country.

articles.title: Chinese Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Chinese Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here did a friendly work on the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Cooperative Farm in Sunan District, Pyongyang, on Friday.
					 They went round the house visited by President Kim Il Sung together with Premier Zhou Enlai, the room dedicated to the history of the DPRK-China friendship and a kindergarten on the farm.
					
					 Then they helped farmers in rice-transplanting.
					
					They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Anti-oxidation Drink Made
articles.content:
Anti-oxidation Drink Made
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Carbonated Fruit Juice Joint Venture Company in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has of late made a super anti-oxidation drink.
					 The Pirobong-trademarked drink contains some sixty kinds of microelements extracted from more than thirty species of natural plants. 
					
					 It, with effects of both preventive and curative treatment, helps improve mental and retentive faculties by multiplying brain cells.  
					
					 It also protects skin from wrinkles and black spots and prevents such geriatric diseases as cerebral haemorrhage, myocardium and brain infarction by removing acid effete matters in time.
					
					 It, much higher than quality cosmetics in anti-oxidation capacity, is efficacious for different skin diseases, including allergic dermatitis. It also makes skin fair.
					
					 The drink has no side-effect. 
					
					 Besides, the company produces carbonated water with apple, peach, strawberry and other fruits.
					
					 Manager of the company Jong Song Ho, 38, told KCNA that the anti-oxidation drink has proved efficacious among workers of such industrial establishments as thermal power station and smeltery and at medical institutions.
					
					 It drew much interest from Chinese, German and other businessmen at the 13th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair held from May 17 to 20.

articles.title: Pochonbo Battle Auguring Rebirth of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Pochonbo Battle Auguring Rebirth of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Seventy-three years has elapsed since a battle was fought in Pochonbo, auguring the rebirth of the Korean nation.
					 The battle in Pochonbo of Pochon Subcounty, Hyesan County, South Hamgyong Province (then), on June 4, Juche 26 (1937) taught the truth that one should fight with arms against the armed aggressors and if so, one is sure to triumph.
					
					 At that time, the Japanese imperialists, who occupied Korea, were intensifying their colonial rule over it to wind up preparations for invading mainland China. They were also trying hard to prohibit the use of Korean language, alleging that "Japan and Korea are one community" and "Japan and Korea are of the same ancestry".
					
					 With the Korean people suffering misfortune and pains under the Japanese colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung made up his mind to organize a battle in the homeland to inspire them with hope for the liberation of the country.
					
					 He led the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) to the northern border area of the country after crossing the River Amnok.
					
					 With his gun report as a signal at 10 p.m, the police substation, subcounty administration office, post office, forest conservation office, fire station and other agencies of the Japanese imperialists were attacked by the KPRA unit at the same time to be enveloped in flames.
					
					 After the battle, the President delivered a speech before the cheering crowd. He said the flames showed that the Korean people were not dead but alive and that if they fought against the Japanese imperialists, they would surely win.
					
					 In the wake of the battle he guided the unit to win again in Kouyushui and Jiansanfeng battles to demonstrate the invincible might of the KPRA and give the Korean people confidence in victory.
					
					 Indeed, the Pochonbo Battle was a momentous event that manifested the justness of the anti-Japanese armed struggle for regaining the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Accused of Dangerous Provocations
articles.content:
S. Korean Accused of Dangerous Provocations
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are going reckless in their moves to seek a way out of their serious ruling crisis in escalating the confrontation and igniting a war in league with foreign forces. This is rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula so tense that a war may break out any moment. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The article goes on: 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are frantically staging everyday such large-scale "demonstration of military muscle" as war exercises targeted against the DPRK in conspiracy with foreign forces. They are contemplating resuming even Team Spirit nuclear war exercises which had been suspended 16 years ago due to the condemnation of public at home and abroad.
					
					 The situation in the waters of the West Sea of Korea remains extremely tense due to the military provocations of the puppet forces which have become more pronounced than ever before since the outbreak of the sinking warship case.
					
					 The puppet military is massively amassing offensive forces in the waters off five islets of the West Sea including Paekryong and Yonphyong islets while vociferating about "defence of the northern limit line" and ceaselessly infiltrating its warships into the territorial waters of the DPRK for the purpose of sparking off a new armed conflict.
					
					 It is needless to say that the large-scale "demonstration of military muscle" and war maneuvers taking place under this situation are as dangerous acts as playing with fire by the side of a powder magazine.  These moves are, in fact, a prelude to an all-out war.
					
					 The DPRK loves peace and does not want a war. But it is the DPRK's spirit and mettle to react to fire with fire and punish the provocateurs with a merciless retaliation of justice.
					
					 If the puppet group finally opts for starting a war of aggression against the DPRK in league with foreign forces, defying its warnings, the group will not be able to escape a thousand-fold indiscriminate retaliatory blow, warns the article.

articles.title: South-South Cooperation Called for
articles.content:
South-South Cooperation Called for
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Developing countries should expand and develop the South-South cooperation. This is an effective way of foiling the moves of the imperialists to plunder, subjugate and pressurize those countries, weathering their economic difficulties and successfully building an independent new society, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Developing countries have keen interest in establishing a new international economic order for the commonness in their position and aspiration as they suffered under the colonial rule of the imperialists in the past.
					
					 If the South-South cooperation makes good progress, it will help create an environment favorable for disabling the unfair and old international economic order and building a new fair international economic order. 
					
					 They have favorable conditions and possibilities for comprehensively expanding and developing the South-South cooperation. They have huge manpower resources and rich natural resources. And they have not a little good experience and technology exchangeable. These serve as a precious asset for comprehensively expanding and developing the South-South cooperation.
					
					  What is important is for developing countries to regard the South-South cooperation as a vital requirement and a common task and buckle down to conducting it. 
					
					 What is essential for expanding and developing the South-South cooperation and establishing the South-South economic relations is to strengthen the regional cooperation and unity. 
					
					 The South-South cooperation is based on the common objective and interests of developing countries as they are keen to achieve economic independence and build an independent new society, filling each other's needs and helping each other. It, therefore, allows no exploitation, plunder, domination and subjugation. 
					
					 If developing countries closely unite and make concerted efforts politically, closely cooperating with one another economically and technologically on the principle of collective self-reliance, the South-South cooperation will display even greater vitality.

articles.title: Actions Staged in S. Korea to Denounce Authorities' Plots
articles.content:
Actions Staged in S. Korea to Denounce Authorities' Plots
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Actions were staged in different parts of Seoul to denounce the plots hatched by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors over the case of the warship "Cheonan's" sinking, according to MBC and KBS of south Korea.
					 On May 31, literature urging the "government" to apologize for causing the tragic case of warship sinking and creating a crisis of a war was distributed in Jongro District and handbills saying that "evidence proving the sinking of the warship was cooked up" and "even a passing dog laughs" and flyers carrying the ugly face of Lee Myung Bak were scattered in the area of Songdong District on the same day.
					
					 Seen on the walls of buildings in Yongdungpho and Rowon districts on May 25 and 29 were posters "We would like to know about the truth about the warship 'Cheonan' case" and "We can't believe the results of investigation conducted to serve the purpose of the fabricated case of the warship 'Cheonan'".

articles.title: Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Peace on Korean Peninsula Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters for the Promotion of the Korean Community of the south Korean Buddhist Jogye Order made public a statement on May 31 calling on the Buddhists to turn out in a movement for achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The statement held that the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a crisis. 
					
					 It urged the authorities to immediately stop the military confrontation and the resumed psychological warfare, a provocation to the DPRK, and come out for a dialogue.
					
					 The organization fixed June as a month for achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula and announced that it would conduct during the month diverse activities for reconciliation and peace against confrontation and war, it noted.

articles.title: Lee Group's Confrontation with DPRK Denounced by Chongryon
articles.content:
Lee Group's Confrontation with DPRK Denounced by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public statements on May 31 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					 O Jae Se, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, said the case of the warship "Cheonan's" sinking was a sheer fabrication made by the south Korean ruling quarters from A to Z and a natural product of the policy of toeing outside forces' line and pursuing confrontation with fellow countrymen pursued by sycophants and traitors.
					
					 He charged that the anti-DPRK smear campaign of the south Korean conservative group is not only throwing a big hurdle in the way of the business of Korean workers in commerce and causing uneasiness among them but also sparking again antagonism in the Korean community in Japan. 
					
					 He declared that broad strata of Korean workers in commerce would unite as one under the banner of "By our nation itself" and resolutely struggle against the racket of the present south Korean ruling quarters to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.  
					
					 Hyon Tae Sik, chief secretary of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, stressed that young Koreans in commerce in Japan would firmly unite as one and turn out in a dynamic struggle to frustrate the war moves of the group of traitors and achieve peace, reunification and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: June 15 Declaration for Korea's Reunification Backed
articles.content:
June 15 Declaration for Korea's Reunification Backed
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee issued a bulletin on May 26 on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The bulletin in an article said that this year marks the lapse of 65 years since the division of the Korean nation by foreign forces and the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 The Korean nation is convinced that the joint declaration serves as a great programme for Korea's reunification because it indicates the path to reunification to be followed by the nation and the ways for doing so, it noted.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration is a milestone for Korea's reunification, supported and hailed by not only the Koreans but also the entire world, it said, stressing that the reunification of Korea will be certainly realized under the banner of the declaration.
					
					 July 27 will always shine as the day of great victory when the Korean people shattered the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" and defended the freedom and independence of the country, said the bulletin.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt issued a statement on May 29 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 The statement disclosed that the sinking case of warship "Cheonan" is a product of the conspiracy between the present south Korean authorities, who attempt to stifle the DPRK and tide over the ruling crisis by diverting elsewhere the attention of the south Korean people, and the U.S. which seeks to enhance its strategic position in Northeast Asia.
					
					 It demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities open to the world public the truth about the case and immediately stop their campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 We positively support all the measures taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty and dignity and express full support and solidarity with the Korean people resolutely struggling against the plots of the U.S. and its stooges, the statement said.
					
					 It called upon all the progressive and peace-loving forces of the world to slash at the reckless aggression moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities and intensify the support and solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The Peruvian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President 
						Kim Il Sung, too, made public a statement on May 25 condemning the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 The statement expressed solidarity with the DPRK's principled stand against the smear campaign on the part of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves Assailed by Dominican Parties
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves Assailed by Dominican Parties
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The New Line Party, the Working Force's Party, the Workers' Party and two other political parties of Dominica released a joint statement on May 28 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique's anti-DPRK moves.
					 The statement recalled that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces have ceaselessly committed provocation and aggression moves to stifle the Korean revolution and the socialist system of the DPRK even after the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement in 1953.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea, the government, the army and the people of the DPRK have emerged victorious in the struggle against the imperialists' aggression for decades under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, being regarded as a paragon of humankind loving peace and freedom, it noted.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the Korean people would never allow themselves to be a slave of imperialism but defend the gains of the revolution and the independent, democratic and popular socialist system at any cost.
					
					 It extended solidarity to the WPK, the government, the army and the people of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre el terreno una fabrica de maquinas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre el terreno una fabrica de maquinas
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la fabrica de maquinas, donde trabaja O Mun Hyon, que marcha a todo galope hacia el gran festival de octubre (mes de fundacion del PTC). 
					Tras recorrer los procesos de produccion, el Dirigente se entero en detalles del estado de produccion viendo las maquinas ultramodernas hechas nuevamente en la fabrica. 
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los obreros de la fabrica hayan producido un viraje trascendental en la produccion de maquinas mediante la modernizacion y cientifizacion de los procesos productivos y el desarrollo e introduccion de nuevas tecnologias. 
					
					Es un gran exito que los obreros de la fabrica hayan producido en un corto plazo las maquinas sofisticadas con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas, dijo el Dirigente. 
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos orgullosos de ellos que prepararon ese magnifico regalo dedicado al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido, y les expreso agradecimiento. 
					
					Hoy dia, podemos fabricar cualquier maquina moderna que se nos antoje, senalo y agrego que esta realidad orgullosa manifiesta claramente el poderio de la industria independiente del Juche que hemos preparado apretando el cinturon. 
					
					El 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC sera la oportunidad significativa para glorificar las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung realizadas en la construccion de nuestro partido, la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de independencia de la humanidad y mostrar el temperamento nacional e impetu indoblegable de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que construyen una gran potencia prospera socialista uniendose monoliticamente en torno al partido, asevero. 
					
					Los estruendosos pasos de todos los militares y civiles en marcha al gran festival de octubre estremecen el cielo y la tierra, subrayo y volvio a exhortar encarecidamente a todos los dominios y unidades a levantar la oleada mas grande de auge para poder celebrar la jubilosa fiesta de octubre tirando los fuegos artificiales de victoria y alegria. 
					
					El Dirigente indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que en lo adelante tambien, los obreros de la fabrica cumpliran satisfactoriamente el papel de vanguardia y brigada de avanzada en la campana para construir una gran potencia prospera, y se fotografio junto a los innovadores laborales de la fabrica. 
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, y los jefes de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: MINREX critica intento de llevar el caso del "Cheonan" a la ONU
articles.content:
MINREX critica intento de llevar el caso del "Cheonan" a la ONU
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- En entrevista con la ATCC sostenida con respecto a que Estados Unidos y sus satelites se mueven para llevar al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el incidente de hundimiento del buque surcoreano "Cheonan" vinculandolo con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 4 la siguiente respuesta:
					Como ya hemos aclarado, es una falsificacion el llamado "resultado de investigacion" de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas sobre el hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan". Si no fuera asi, no habria la razon que les impida aceptar nuestra iniciativa sobre el envio del grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC a cargo de confirmar objetivamente ese "resultado".
					
					 La clave de la solucion del caso esta en que la RPDC revise y confirme en calidad de victima el "resultado de investigacion" de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					El "grupo de investigacion" creado por las autoridades surcoreanas bajo el control de EE.UU. es un ente intransparente que no satisface la norma internacional. 
					
					El circulo militar surcoreano controlaba rigurosamente ese grupo en que al decir de ellas, tomaban parte unos extranjeros.
					
					Pero, no se ha publicado ningun detalle de con que tramites y procedimiento han sido elegidos esos extranjeros y de si todos ellos han firmado o no el "resultado de investigacion". Por esta razon, las autoridades surcoreanas no pudieron denominar oficialmente el "grupo de investigacion" como el internacional, sino se vieron obligadas a llamarlo como "grupo de investigacion conjunta de civiles y militares". 
					
					Y ahora tratan de aplacar las sospechas de su "resultado", levantadas en el ambito internacional, involucrando a los especialistas de unos paises que ni siquiera son victimas del incidente.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no debe repetir el error de aquella vez cuando su tribuna habia sido ensuciada con las mentiras de EE.UU. sobre Irak.
					
					 Para evitar que sea malempleado otra vez como aparato de coercion y arbitrariedad de EE.UU., es importante que todos los paises miembros del consejo juzguen independiente y correctamente el incidente prestando su atencion primordial al esclarecimiento objetivo de la verdad del caso.
					
					  De ser planteado este problema en el Consejo de Seguridad, ellos deberan tomar primero la medida que contribuya a que EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea acepten lo que ya propuso nuestro pais, victima directa del incidente, o sea, al grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional, de modo que este pueda confirmar el "resultado de investigacion".
					
					  Si EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras llevan el incidente al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y obligan a debatirlo imponiendo su unilateral "resultado de investigacion" y eludiendo la comprobacion objetiva de la verdad del caso, se revelara de modo irrefutable el siniestro objetivo que hay detras de ello.
					
					  Entonces, EE.UU. y el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no tendran nada que decir aunque la RPDC reaccione con sobredureza como antes ni eludiran la responsabilidad de haber impedido la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y atizado el conflicto.

articles.title: Continuan mitines provinciales contra la banda de traidor MB
articles.content:
Continuan mitines provinciales contra la banda de traidor MB
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 3 los mitines de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, la de Hwanghae del Norte, la de Kangwon y la ciudad de Nampho para condenar las maniobras  de enfrentamiento anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					Participaron en los actos los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el Poder, las entidades sociales, instituciones, fabricas, empresas y granjas a todos los niveles, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en las respectivas localidades.
					
					En las ocasiones los oradores senalaron que debido a las maquinaciones de las autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea y los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses coligados con aquellas se crea la situacion muy tirante en la Peninsula Coreana donde podria estallar la guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					Subrayaron que el incidente del hundimiento del buque surcoreano de guerra es una absurda farsa inventada por la banda de traidores y calificaron a esta banda que habla tanto de la "sancion" internacional de los enemigos jurados que dan espaldas a la nacion.
					
					Expresaron la voluntad de frustrar la campana intrigante anti-RPDC de los belicistas surcoreanos diciendo que el temperamento del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea es responder con el castigo rotundo a la provocacion de los enemigos.
					
					Todos los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los demas trabajadores deben mantener el pleno estado de movilizacion al combate y poner de manifiesto el entusiasmo patriotico y la actividad creativa en el cumplimiento de sus deberes revolucionarios asumidos para asi contribuir activamente a adelantar la victoria en la gran campana por construir la gran potencia prospera, concluyeron los oradores.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la actitud provocativa de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la actitud provocativa de titeres surcoreanos
 Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- Los belicistas titeres surcoreanos buscan la salida de su crisis de gobernacion en perseguir la confrontacion y la guerra en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. Debido a sus maniobras imprudentes, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se torna cada vez mas peligrosa acercandose a la guerra.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos libran freneticamente en estos dias junto con las fuerzas extranjeras la campana de "demostracion de las fuerzas armadas", inclusive los ejercicios de guerra anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Para colmo, tratan de reiniciar el ejercicio de guerra nuclear "Team Spirit", que suspendieron hace 16 anos, impotentes de resistir las denuncias de la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					 El Mar Oeste de Corea se halla ahora en un estado hipertenso debido a la campana de provocacion militar de los titeres surcoreanos que recrudece cada dia mas con motivo del incidente del buque de guerra "Cheonan".
					
					 Abogando por "mantener la linea de limite al Norte", la camarilla del circulo militar titere refuerza en gran medida las fuerzas atacantes en las 5 islas del Mar Oeste como Paekryong y Yonphyong y manda continuamente sus buques a las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC con fin de provocar nuevos choques armados.
					
					 La "demostracion de fuerzas armadas" y los ejercicios de guerra de gran tamano, que se cometen bajo tales circunstancias, dan lo mismo que prender el fuego al lado de una santabarbara, siendo el preludio de la guerra total.
					
					 La RPDC ama la paz y no desea la guerra. Pero, tiene el temperamento de pagar el fuego con el fuego y castigar a los provocadores con el justo e implacable golpe de respuesta.
					
					Si la banda de titeres surcoreanos opta por provocar la guerra contra el Norte en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras desoyendo la advertencia de la RPDC, no podra evitar el indiscriminado ataque de represalia mil veces mas duro.
